pullRequest.title: Windchild's Logger Expansion
pullRequest.bodyText:
I've expanded upon @SJuliez's great logging changes in #2088 with this PR to handle the options missed in that, plus removed the pretty much unused StringBuilder versions. This will allow for significantly more simplification in logging functionality.
To Review: Whitespace differences off.
This MUST be merged at the SAME time as MegaMek/mekhq#1963

nodes.bodyText: Would this be an example of a logger.fatal() message (instead of info)?
